inclusion.criterion: entering the last trimester of pregnancy (in range 26-30 weeks of gestation)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: residing in the Greater Accra Metropolitan Area or area served by the Korle Bu Teaching Hospital
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: fluent in either English, Twi, or Ga.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: BMI ≥ 35 at booking (first antenatal appointment for current pregnancy)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: pregnancy complicated by obstetric complications (hypertension [pre-eclampsia, gestational hypertension, chronic hypertension], diabetes [gestational or not], or intra-uterine growth restriction [<10th %ile for growth])
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: sleep complicated by medical conditions (known to get <4 hours of sleep per night due to insomnia, or musculoskeletal disorder that prevents sleeping on a certain side [e.g., arthritic shoulder])
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient presented with a severe 'exploding' headache after hitting her head on a cabinet. She was diagnosed with an AVM and had abnormal vasculature. However, she refused PT evaluation but was ambulating independently without difficulty.
